parameters.text: "Press 1 to change potion, Press Q to use it"
"Press 2 to change Spell, Right Click to Use it"
"Press 3 to change Summon, Press Shift to Use"
"An Health Potion that restores all Health Points"
"A Mana Potion that restores all Mana Points"
"A Lightning Spell, heavy but at a cost"
"A Shield Spell, very powerful, blocks any attack"
"A Summon Spell, evoke a Soul that follows and attacks enemies"
